sgcool_label_text:This collection of aquatint illustrations of the first Anglo-Burmese War in 1824. The prints were based on original drawings by Lieutenant Joseph Moore
 a senior naval officer of the 89th Regiment
 and dedicated to the Court of Directors of the British East India Company.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This collection of aquatint illustrations of the first Anglo-Burmese War in 1824. The prints were based on original drawings by Lieutenant Joseph Moore, a senior naval officer of the 89th Regiment, and dedicated to the Court of Directors of the British East India Company.
